body_content.explanation: to search a place and discover things about it:
examples: The best way to explore the countryside is on foot.
Robots, rather than astronauts, explore space now.
The children have gone exploring in the woods.

body_content.explanation: to think about, talk about, or study something, or to experience it, in order to find out more about it:
examples: They are exploring the possibility of collaborating on a new project.
At this point we are just exploring our options.
Scientists are exploring multiple avenues to develop the most effective vaccine.
The movie explores the themes of love and loss.
The course will explore these management issues in detail.
Computers allow children to easily explore an idea, and be more experimental.
Working on the play and exploring deaf culture has been a profound experience for many in the cast.
